website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its versatility and high 7200 mAh capacity.
pros: 7200 mAh, 3-in-1 device warms your hands, charges your devices, and lights your way with an LED flashlight
Comes with a carrying case and USB cable
Choice of metallic silver or pink
cons: Some found it to be boxier and less ergonomic than other options
Others claim it doesn't get hot enough

customer_reviews.title: Great for guitar players too!
customer_reviews.text: Hey I love this thing. I have diabetes and my hands get cold, especially playing guitar at church. This thing is hardly noticeable to the congregation and works perfectly for me. Many thanks to The Outdoor Way. Fast shipping and great communication after the sale.
customer_reviews.author: gl3045

customer_reviews.title: A nice item to help you survive the winters.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from being able to provide power for other devices, aside from having a small flashlight, aside from being easily rechargeable - what I like most about this warmer is the fact that it has some intelligence to it in that it does not get so hot that it gets uncomfortable. I have used other disposable warmers and while nice they often get so hot at the start they can almost burn your skin then they cool down an provide just minimal heat at the end. This unit starts immediately, is warm in just a few seconds, and is comfortable in your hand or pocket. A nice addition to your toolset for surviving the winters.
customer_reviews.author: G Darke

customer_reviews.title: After 10 seconds it was already pretty warm and then after 30 seconds it was significantly ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this hand warmer for my wife because her hands and feet always seem to be cold. I decided to check out how effective it was myself and was pleasantly surprised that it warmed up so quickly. After 10 seconds it was already pretty warm and then after 30 seconds it was significantly warm (or hot). It didn't get too hot so as to be uncomfortable. It's cool that it also has a flashlight and even more so that it can be used to charge your phone. Nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Gymtime

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget for the old and cold.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 88 year old Aunt. She has cold hands and this has been a miracle for her. While a bit expensive it has already become cheaper that the $1 disposable hand warmers. A small carrying case would have been nice. We are using the smallest child's sock they had on the rack to make it easier for her to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Onionson

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to the easy open packaging I could do this
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my daughter who is a "snow bunny", and decided to check it out first as in the past we have used the disposable heat packets. Thanks to the easy open packaging I could do this, and repackage it pristinely! Very nice product! It heated up really fast...seconds, and feels great in either hand, and the warmth level is adjustable. I have a friend with a cold hand and feet condition...she warms her hands regularly under the tap when they turn blue...wears gloves even in the spring, and I am going to recommend this to her too!
customer_reviews.author: M.J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold hands
customer_reviews.text: Update: I can no longer recommend this hand warmer. Second winter using this and the battery capacity is greatly reduced. On the low heat setting it only lasts about an hour. Very disappointing that it would die out after one season of use. I work in my basement home office and it gets cold down there in the winter. My hands were always freezing. This little guy works well. I can't leave it on all day and only turn it on for short periods to warm up my hands as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I've been Replaced by a Hand Warmer!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Outdoors Way hand warmer is my husband's new best friend. He is so thrilled with it that he wants me to order another one so he can hold one in each hand. Since that means he may no longer be able to hold my hand, I plan to order one for myself! We are both very impressed with how quickly it warms up to a toasty temperature. We look forward to testing to see how long it takes to charge a cell phone. Since our bedroom is pitch black at night, I'm sure the flashlight feature will come in handy as well. Try it! You'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn E. Aldana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get as hot as promised - update in comment
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get up to the temperature promised. And yes it was fully charged and yes I gave it ample warm-up time (measured periodically over a 2 hour span) A second one showed up without notice - cudos to the company for replacing based on my review here. It's warming up now and I'm very hopeful as it looks like it had been opened, and maybe tested? Will update!
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that has ever helped!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this because the individual hand warmers have shrunken so much that they are a joke. I paid $85 to get heater ski gloves and returned them because heated palms and the back of my hands just doesn't do it for me. I am known to be the portable beer chiller, so this changes everything. I switch from hand to hand when outside to super heat my figures on the low setting! I thought this was a charming gift until I depended on it one cold day walking the dogs where my mittens were freezing from the inside out. I haven't even used the flashlight nor the charger, but everyone with cold hands needs this.
customer_reviews.author: Dulci Hill

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: I like this little thing. I had bought a Zippo hand warmer before this and the catalyst crapped out pretty quickly on it. After searching for hand warmer alternatives, I came across this electric hand warmer/power bank/flashlight and jumped on it. Working outside in the rain, my hands get cold pretty quickly. The day after this came in the mail, it was put to good use. Warms up quickly. The low setting is pretty warm. Enough juice to last the entire day. Flashlight is a little annoying, only because the beam is a little out of focus. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for over a year but now it doesn't charge my phone
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product that did everything advertised: hand warmer, charger, and flashlight (minimal). This thing gets really warm! Recently my phone displays a message saying "This accessory may not be supported" at which point it doesn't charge the phone any longer. I've seen charge cables go bad before so I tried another which works on other batteries but that was not the issue. For some reason this battery just decided one day to no longer charge my iPhone. It's too bad because it was perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the zippo 6 hour
customer_reviews.text: Just to get it out of the way, no electric hand warmer will ever compete with the likes of combustion catalytic hand warmers. The maximum heat output of this device is right on par with the six hour version of a certain warmer by a certain lighter . However this device does a better job of retaining that heat when touching it with cold hands. Especially when you let it warm up inside of the felt bag. Also if you reach down to the very bottom of this felt bag you will notice it has a small lanyard cord built in to wear it around your neck
customer_reviews.author: brandon9689

customer_reviews.title: This gets warm but the button pushing is a pain in the rear.
customer_reviews.text: You need to push the button and then push the button again and play with it to get it to work and do what you want. In the cold and outdoors, your fingers are already cold. Make this with a real sliding switch and maybe I will keep it and not return it next time. I bought 4 from a company that makes them that way, and will be buying more. This one does get warm so that is a plus, and the runtime is about right.
customer_reviews.author: P Soup

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for he suffers from frostbite while in the Army in Germany. When the temperature goes below 50, his hands are like ice!! The reason for buying this is to warm his fingers enough so the oxygen measuring while read, but this device is not warming up to the temperature he needs to be able to read his oxygen levels. It worked once to hot and then it has remained on lukewarm which is not enough heat to warm his fingers. So disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Toto

customer_reviews.title: Charging a device is a bit tricky
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread. I take it deer hunting once a year, the last 3 years, still holding a charge and getting hot or hotter than you want. I bought 4 and gave 3 to my uncle's and Dad. They are getting older and are crazy how long they have worked and worked very well! Buy these! They work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic-got me thru the cold winter!
customer_reviews.text: I used my heater just about every morning throughout this horribly cold winter. I have Raynaud's syndrome and extreme rheumatiod arthritis. This thing is a godsend. I never have had it on high because the low setting is so warm. The battery is long-lasting. It heats up very quickly. I LOVE this thing! The customer service at this company is EXCELLENT! Too bad I can't say the same for Amazon, who so carelessly packaged the item that it was totally battered when I received it, but Mike promptly replaced it. The 2nd device was also very poorly packaged by Amazon, but only the box was damaged and device was fine.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Warmer gets hot fast and lasts just as the description says.
customer_reviews.text: This hand warmer has been an awesome addition to my hunting equipment. Warmer lasted a full morning deer hunt on high with power to spare and with a plug in for about an hour during lunch it made it through the evening deer hunt on low. Here in MN I normally go through 2 -4 hand warmers a day sitting out in the stand . Now I just plug it back in and I am good for the whole day. Quality of the product is awesome. It feels solid in your hand not cheap like other products. And yes it gets hot very fast even on low. This product has exceeded my expectations in every way.
customer_reviews.author: ldl

customer_reviews.title: Just better.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my existing electric hand warmer, which I thought was nice, this turns out to be a lot better at near half the price. I tested both running at the same the other night (both had been spent and then fully recharged). This one was much hotter and lasted about twice as long (at least 2/3rds as long). And that was with this one on high temp setting (the other one has no low setting) -- if I had left it at the default setting (which is the lower setting at power up), it would have been about the same heat and lasted even longer. I wish I had two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: I play golf with a lighter fluid based handwarmer which ran out of steam after two hours the last time used. Thought I’d give a battery operated a try. So good I bought another one ! I’m impressed! This item stays comfy warm and last well past the time it takes for a round of golf. Wish they had these many years ago when I used to go rabbit hunting. I’m seriously thinking about getting another so I’ll have one in each pocket. FYI ..... I used it this morning for a trip to the dentist since I had to walk a few blocks in the bitter cold. Handwarmer was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Great heat runtime. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: So I have a few hand warmers that are highly rated like Human Creations. I gotta say this The Outdoors Way is not a cheap knockoff at all. It works for a really long time and they dont lie on the heating runtimes. The heat on high stays warm even when you hold it constantly. You don't have to let it heat back up again to get it to a nice temperature to once again to hold. The light is nice in a pinch and its still a decent phone charger. It has a simple one button interface. Th8s company deserves every 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Rober P

customer_reviews.title: I expected more.
customer_reviews.text: This worked for about a year, then the USB port wouldn’t charge the phone. The contacts in the port seemed to have lifted off the insulator. I expected more from something that got such good ratings. This didn’t get used a lot, so it definitely should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement, stopped working after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Need some help please . Bought and loved for several months, hibernated over summer and when fall came back it doesn’t work, won’t hold a charge anymore. Still in warranty, purchased January 20, 2019. Can I get a replacement especially in the styling pink?
customer_reviews.author: Dog MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They Save My Life!
customer_reviews.text: I have sevaral of these warmers. They save my life!! I am soooo cold-blooded. I use them every day! I commend this company, in particular, because they included a little bag with a "lanyard" so you can wear it around your neck. So now I use 2 in pockets, and wear a third one all day every day. And I do feel the difference with that extra one right on my chest. Thank you, company, for including the little bag!
customer_reviews.author: Learner

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: This did not hold it's charge for more than 2 hours. I returned and was very disappointed because my husband woul have liked if the charge lasted longer. I bought another brand and it was not much better. I give up on electric hand warmers.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA MATTINGLY

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but a bit unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I used this approx. 3 days a week for a couple months. It gets nice and warm and lasts about 4 hours on the low setting. It did seem to randomly turn off sometimes when I was using it. The charging cable is short, so it dangled from my outlet while charging. Eventually the inner component for the charging cable got pulled out of place so it wouldn't charge any more. Admittedly that's my fault for not finding a different setup to charge it, but it doesn't explain the random shutting off while in use. I will try a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Saefas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These things have become a must have for deer hunting, ice fishing or any other winter activity. I bought one on a whim and everybody fought over it. My whole family now has them. They are great hand warmers. They work really well in a pouch, pocket or hung around your neck in the provided bag. they get warm almost instantly and last for hours on a single charge. They have a little flashlight in them that would be great for an emergency. You can also use it to charge your phone in a pinch. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: John A MIller JR

customer_reviews.title: Charging issues and design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The placement of the USB port on the side is really bad when hunting. If you have the unit in your pocket, the cord sticks out and I’ve actually had 2 cords break where the metal usb plug meets the cord. The port needs to be on the top or bottom so that it doesn’t put strain on the plug. Additionally, I’ve had issues with charging where I attach the charging cord to my phone and then after 5-10 minutes, I notice that it is no longer charging. So I keep having to unplug and re plug-in my phone
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice product .
customer_reviews.text: My hands are always cold , and I was looking for something that could be used indoors . This product is great ! Keeps my hands warm when they get cold , can be used indoors or outside as well . You can recharge it with the included USB cord . The low setting works well enough to warm my hands nicely . It also acts as a flashlight and can recharge your cell phone too in a pinch !
customer_reviews.author: Tee Time

customer_reviews.title: Nice hand warmer and power pack
customer_reviews.text: The hand warmer is nice, quite warm. We're actualy going to use it as a small heating pack for sore joints while travelling. EDIT: When I first got it and used it as a power pack for my Galaxy S7 Android phone, the phone's screen stayed on during charging. I contacted customer service and they sent out a replacement right away. Good on them! The new unit works perfectly. thx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Productivity of this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand warmer for my sons birthday as he sells home improvement and is always outside giving estimates to homeowners on roofing and siding and windows. He is very pleased with how well this product works and now his job has become easier in the winter here in the great lakes region where we are experiencing below zero wind chill factors. I recommend this product to anyone who works outside.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: I'm going ice fishing soon and bought this Hand Warmer ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm going ice fishing soon and bought this Hand Warmer. I recently used it to charge my iPhone as I was recording video from it, and it performed perfectly. I lost the USB cord used for recharging the unit and couldn't find how to buy a spare ANYWHERE. I called the company "The Outdoors Way" and they immediately offered to mail me the necessary recharging cord from their overstock! Phone support is always part of any review I make and they were prompt, courteous and efficient. 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Warmed up nicely and was warm enough on low setting. Problem is that it does not last the 7 hours as advertised, only lasted 4 hrs. I fully charged the devise both time and both times had the same poor battery life. The only reason I give it 2 stars is that it did warm up and provided a comfortable temperature at the low setting. Good for those not spending a long time outside away from power to re-charge the device.
customer_reviews.author: Maria I. Cavallo

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand warmer and excellent phone charger too
customer_reviews.text: This little hand warmer did an excellent job and I was really amazed at the output from it. Then I needed to charge my phone and had been using the hand warmer so I hoped there might be enough energy left and I was surprised to find it still charged my phone and still heated some more. The flashlight is ok not the best there is but it will suffice when you need one in a jam.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Provides immediate relief for cold hands
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! I have extremely poor circulation from congestive heart failure. My fingers turn to ice and hurt frequently throughout the day. I wear compression gloves which help with the numbness but still left me cold. So I gave this a try and I am so glad I did. It heats right up and provides immediate relief. I am so glad to have found this!
customer_reviews.author: W.T. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at First
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing a rechargable hand warmer, and didn't get my hopes up regarding how it would perform. All my skepticism is gone! I love this thing! Literally I will take this everywhere I go and it is definitely a game changer. I recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I'veDoneMyResearch

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this partially to recharge phone and camera and of course as a hand warmer, the light is a great plus. Don't know how to rate battery yet, I haven't used it much, will give it a 5 star for now because everything looks good. Will definitely take it hunting this fall. Used to take the old lighter fluid hand warmer and I believe the animals could smell it, this should eliminate that. Instructions are good. I would recommend others to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill A.

customer_reviews.title: compact and light weight, but provides effective heat for 6 hours or more
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations in every respect. These are well made, highly effective and a very good value for the price. Best relief I have found for cold hands associated with Raynaud's. I enjoy being active outside in cold weather, but I had been unable to find any gloves or mittens to keep my hands warm enough without impeding functionality. Carrying one of these and shifting occasionally between hands is more than enough. Often merely carrying it in my pocket raises body temperature enough to permit functionality with lighter weight gloves. I liked the first one so well that I bought a second one as backup and to share with my wife when she needs it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kruse

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have Raynauds which causes my hands to become ice cold. I am also a physician whose patients don't appreciate a doctor with freezing hands. I keep this hand warmer at work and hold on to it between patients as I am charting. It heats up very quickly and the battery lasts a long time. It doesn't get too hot though. I am happier and my patients are happier. I've never used the flashlight so I can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: This hand warmer is a fantastic little product. I say "little" because that is one of its greatest features, in my opinion, besides the fact that it gets wonderfully warm/hot in such a short period of time. I just put my hand in my pocket and grasp it to get beautiful comfort from cold, "Reynaud Syndrome" hands. Also, I am very grateful for its ability to charge my cell phone when I am away from home. Thank you so much for a marvelous, practical product! I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Archambault

customer_reviews.title: Best handwarmer I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd brand of hand warmer I've bought because I have a problem with getting cold hands at work. I wanted another warmer to use while my other one was charging. I was very impressed, the other brand was another leading brand and it would get cold quickly and sometimes take a while to heat back up. This warmer on the other hand got warmer quicker, have not even needed to use the higher setting, and stayed warm even with cold hands. I liked the little case (bag) that came with it. I have not had to use the flashlight feature or the charging feature, but if I needed another warmer, this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Boschee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Bowhunting!
customer_reviews.text: I bow hunt in Kansas. I don't like wearing gloves while hunting. This past week it has been down in the teens and low 20s. These hand warmers are awesome. So much better than the disposable type. I can run these on the low setting and they keep my hands nice and warm. Wish I would have discovered these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Now your heating!
customer_reviews.text: The is a fantastic little hand warmer w/extras. Excellent, rapid heating. Charge this baby up, your ready to go! If you want to, put it in it's velvet holder. I think it is velvet? Comfort, warming heat for your cool hands. I am going to buy another for both hands. Love this little unit!

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE! Still going after 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hand warmer now for 2 years. I like to write reviews when after I know that my purchase was durable and not just something disposable. This is still functioning and I am a happy camper! And I am happy to refrain from using disposable products that just become landfill. UPDATE: Year 3, I finally bought a new one. It is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: DavidA

customer_reviews.title: It failed to stay on after two charge cycles.
customer_reviews.text: Switch for flashlight feature would not turn off. Warmer part died after a couple of uses. Typical imported junk. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Plume

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: This hand warmer lasted one and a half winters. It was not continually used basically just on the weekends for the winter months. No it’s simply doesn’t charge. So it gets put into the pile of crap that I bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: guida Bird

customer_reviews.title: Excited for ice fishing
customer_reviews.text: It warms up quickly and it is so much better than those disposable hot hands which seem to be fueled by pure imagination. Can't wait to take it ice fishing. It's hell having to dip your hands into the freezing water before handling a fish but with this I don't have to worry about getting frostbite anymore or at least stop losing feeling in my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: xavier valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Works great as hand wormer. I ski, alot. All conditions. This is my second season with these hand warmers, no issues. When placed inside of ski jacket or in my ski pants, the entire body stays warm! No need for charcoal hand warmers. No need to buy the boot heaters for over $100. No need for heated gloves. My ski day goes from 9am to 5pm. They last the entire day of skiing! Buy two. When recharging one, use the other.
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: No regrets whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! Doesn't get too hot, and the heat is consistently the same temperature right up until it is either turned off or the battery is used up. On a full charge it tends to last 3-4 hours if left on lower heat setting. Compared to microwaveable or the disposable hand warmers you will get a longer more consistent heat. My favorite feature is that if I'm camping, hiking, or just away from home I can connect the USB cable charger to any typical USB car adapter charger and charge back up. Absolutely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Travis D

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for this product!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my boys play competitive baseball. We are often at the ball fields for 6+ hours per day. This hand warmers work, and work for a long time. They have lasted at least least 6 hours per charge! I initially bought 1 for me and 1 for my wife. We now have 2 each ( one for each hand). Several families from our teams are now ordering these for themselves. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these and was so impressed, I bought 3 more for my nephews and brother. Carrying around a way to charge your phone that also doubles as a hand warmer is a great idea. Not to mention the flashlight. Easily lasts an entire football game with power left over to charge your phone. If I have one suggestion, it would be to make a waterproof model. Homerun guys! Keep making products like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG, where have these been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these so I could continue to walk outside in the winter. And because I keep the expensive oil heat turned down in my house , my hands are always cold. These heaters warm up almost instantly. I haven't tried the high setting because the low is quite warm and perfect temp. They are stylish, well made silver metal. Slightly large for my small hands but not uncomfortable. I spend an hour or so each night moving them around my body (aching knee, sore low back, tight neck etc) which has been an unexpected bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Chris Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable hand warmer from The Outdoors Way.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, it performs as advertised , we are very impressed with the customer service and timely delivery. My wife has been using the hand warmer on a daily basis due to the cold weather. Again my wife is very satisfied with the hand warmer from Outdoors Way, we look forward to doing business with them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jim upton

customer_reviews.title: Great for deliveries on cold winter mornings
customer_reviews.text: This handwarmer fills my needs perfectly. I deliver for Meals on Wheels in Pittsburgh and the winter temperatures can be brutal. With deliveries, I can’t keep my gloves on, and the Outdoors Way hand warmer stays toasty warm in my pocket until I need it to warm my hands. I had 2 previous hand warmers that would quit before I was finished. The Outdoors Way is warmer and lasts as long as I need it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Saved my fingers from frostbite
customer_reviews.text: Do not depend on this if it's well below freezing to keep you warm because it may not heat up properly (as to be expected with lithium cells). That being said it probably saved my hands from getting frostbite while snowshoeing, I just had to keep it near my chest to initially warm it up then it was able to heat up to about 80°f when it was -10° out, saving my wet freezing fingers so thanks for that.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Stamp: APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: If you want to melt your hand off then don’t buy this. If you want a warm hug by a panda bear that has no teeth or claws then this is for you. Turn it on before you get in a deer stand, otherwise you mess up and turn on a huge spotlight...
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product! Had a small issue with our lab puppy finding the box after UPS delivered it. The unit has a few bite marks and still works great but the charge cord was not able to survive. Customer service was great helping me get a replacement cord. I was so pleased with performance that I ordered myself a second one and two more units to give as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lampe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for me on my last few hiking trips. I was doing a lot of mountain hiking in 20 degree weather. I kept the electronic hand warmer either in my coat pocket or inside a muff type hand warmer that goes around my waist, The kind that football quarterbacks use. On the high setting the hand warmer really cranked out the heat for a full 7 - 8 hours. I also used it to keep my camera batteries warm. Fabulous product, works as claimed. I actually bought 2 more after using the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Castell

customer_reviews.title: Wow, amazing device
customer_reviews.text: I left it charged and unused for about 10 months in a drawer. I took it out yesterday thinking I needed to recharge it and to my surprise it had a full charge. I like this product and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Xtopher

customer_reviews.title: Poor lifespan
customer_reviews.text: The hand warmer function only lasted 2 weeks then stopped warming all together.
customer_reviews.author: truckwork

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of heat for over 6 hours.  Doesn't stink like the Zippo, so I don't have to worry about deer smelling it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the USB port was on an end rather than on the side because it would fit better in the pocket when plugged in. Aside from that, I love this thing. I had it on low setting from 0530 to 1330 on a single charge. Even on low setting, it gives plenty of heat.
customer_reviews.author: dstine

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend Outdoor way
customer_reviews.text: Hand warmer had an issue after first charge, contacted Outdoor way. Left message on voicemail, their team contacted me and sent a replacement immediately, no charge in diff color. Just based on customer service alone, I'd recommend Outdoor way. Great Job Mike! RK
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little USB charger with built-in hand-warmer and flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: Great "stocking stuffer" for those who need portable heat. The built-in flashlight with the fact that it can also charge your devices makes this an almost MUST HAVE. Highly recommended - especially those in colder climates.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyJ

customer_reviews.title: This is only one to buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought another brand of hand warmer on Amazon because of reviews and lower price. For me it wasn’t worth the shape or hype. The Outdoors Ways is more expensive but outstanding in construction and operation. It meets and exceed the published specifications. I do wish that it was wavy shape like some others but putting it in the velvet bag that’s included helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Took this little gem on a May Canadian fishing trip. We had several days of fishing in 35-45 degree weather. I placed it in a hand pouch and the amount of heat on the low setting was impressive. It lasted about 4 hours on a full charge. It was significantly warmer than disposable hand warmers. Highly recommended for cold hands or people who have Raynaud’s.
customer_reviews.author: Ett1033

customer_reviews.title: but I recently began carrying this hand warmer everywhere I go and it works great. I do wish the carrying case it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: This hand warmer is fabulous!! It is rechargeable, so needs no batteries. It gets very warm and the charge lasts a long time. I have arthritis in my hands and when they are cold they hurt, but I recently began carrying this hand warmer everywhere I go and it works great. I do wish the carrying case it comes with was larger because I couldn't fit the hand warmer in it, but it is still a great device!
customer_reviews.author: pweb

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Nice & keeps its temperature. Worked right out of the packaging. Slightly larger than I'd like, but it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! I thought I was ordering only a hand warmer, and was pleasantly surprised to find out that it is also a charger for my phone, and a flashlight/beacon. I suffer from Reynauds (and I mean suffer), and this keeps my hands very toasty warm. Easy to use, easy to charge, great for camping too.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L.K. M.

customer_reviews.title: good buy, got to have if you are an outdoor person..
customer_reviews.text: good buy, great price, does get pretty warm very fast, but not to a point where the device will burn you. the build light is a nice touch and so are a usb port to charge your phone in emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Warmer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother who recently moved to Texas with us from S. Florida. She has Raynaud's disease and her hands will turn white when it is cold outside or inside. I saw this hand warmer and felt this would be perfect for her. She absolutely loves it, works perfectly and easily and the bonus is that it's rechargable! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ripsfan

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Originally bought another brand but returned it and bought this instead. The other one didnt last the battery long. This one takes several hours before it drained. Heat is excellent with 2 settings. I’ll definitely recommend this product. Might buy more for gifts to others!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well inside a glove.
customer_reviews.text: The unit works well if you put it inside your glove. I had no problem figuring out how to operate the unit. Holding down the button for 10 seconds turns the heat on in the low heat mode and one more short push changes it to high heat. Holding it down another ten seconds turns it off.
customer_reviews.author: jbigdude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the hand warmer for my son’s birthday. He loves bow hunting but his hands get cold. He used it today and thinks it is an awesome product. It warmed up quickly and he loves the light and charger features. He suggests adding a radio to it if you upgrade :) Thanks for the great service and small business hospitality, Mike!
customer_reviews.author: PattyK

customer_reviews.title: Warming function works great but power button is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Gets warmer much faster and is a little bit warmer overall than other brands I have tried but the control button click system is awful and doesn't always work the way it should. Sometime it's hard to turn on or off or get the flashlight on.
customer_reviews.author: Killeraxemannic

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this handwarmer so far. It warms up quickly holds the heat for a long time, will keep my cell phone charged and lights up my life! I've received 2 charming emails from "The Outdoors Way" encouraging me to contact them with any questions or concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Warms up in less than a minute, stays warm for several hours or longer if you switch off when not needed, the low heat setting is enough for me and I appreciate the flashlight. I did read the instructions and everything worked. Very, very much appreciated. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and effectively
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on several early morning walks, with the temperatures ranging from 23F to 30F. It warms up quickly and seems to hold its charge well. I have had no issues operating the on/off button, which appeared to be an issue for some folks.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Hull

customer_reviews.title: I NEED ANOTHER ONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does just what the company says it does!! Two nice settings............. have used it a few times on the golf course and a lot of my friends are going to get one cause I'm not sharing... it's too cold in Reno! As planned, I figured that if I liked it, I would need one for the other hand..... so I'm going to get a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hullin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Raynaud's sufferers or anybody with cold hands. Will charge your phone too!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of these types of hand warmers. This one is HOT even when on low setting. I love it. Seems to last a long time. You can use it to charge your phone, too.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diva

customer_reviews.title: My office is always freezing
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm....warms your hands quickly....then your body follows soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carter

customer_reviews.title: stopped charging after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for two weeks but stopped taking a charge yesterday. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Patient Shopper

customer_reviews.title: these hand warmers are amazing. My hands stay toasty
customer_reviews.text: I have Renaud's Disease and it takes nothing at all to have my fingers to lose their circulation. I avoid going outside if it's at all chilly. But, no more! these hand warmers are amazing. My hands stay toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my husband and I since we love walking out together in our neighbourhood and my hands get pretty cold very fast. He loves and it has helped me too when my hands are freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Ena T.

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase another.Have now purchased another and am equally pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I charged and tried out its warmth as soon as I received this. I was very pleased with results. Do not intend to use until cool mornings on the golf course this spring. Intend to purchase another as soon as they are available.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: This is a great warming device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son-in-law for hunting. He sits in a tree stand and it has helped keep his hands warm. I then bought one for my daughter who is a hiker/rock climber. Both reasons to keep your hands warm. The added benefits of flashlight and usb charger are great for them too. They have both been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rudy1139

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. I bought it for the hand warmer
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. Reading all the reviews helped make my mind up on ordering these. They were delivered fast, the 2 day prime way. The next day upper state New York had 80 mile an hour winds for 2 days. We lost our power,the unit was mailed all charged up, plugged my phone in. Awesome. I bought it for the hand warmer, that works great also.
customer_reviews.author: Josey Wales

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I had never even thought to look for something like this until I was looking through gift ideas for guys at Christmas. I bought this for my husband because he is outside a lot and always comes in with cold hands. It works great. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Cool little device for keeping your hands warm
customer_reviews.text: Got this for occasional walks out in the frozen tundra. I hate having cold hands and it does the trick. Warms up in a couple minutes and appears to hold a decent charge(only had it a short while). Vendor sent it quickly...hats off to Mike.
customer_reviews.author: Wiccandolin

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: You always have doubts if a product will actually work or are you just throwing good money down the drain. I'll be honest....these little guys actually warm up nicely and I wish to tell you all that yes, this product does what it was stated to do. I have yet to use long term but as of now its a go. Seller seems genuine enough and I do appreciate that, hard to find honest folk anymore. God gets the Glory and this seller gets a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: rsljr

customer_reviews.title: Works great, really warms up
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it! Works great, really warms up. Used it both hand warmer and charge my phone (not same time).
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who hunts frequently in the winter. He was excited about it because he said he'd be able to keep his trigger finger warm without using a glove. Also liked the port for recharging. It charged and worked properly out of the box. Will update after it's been used a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: The unit has a nice solid feel to it
customer_reviews.text: More than I really expected actually. The unit has a nice solid feel to it, not loaded up with a ton of fancy options which makes it EZ to use. Heats up quickly. Might not ever need the flashlight, but heck, who knows. I like it, and it arrived at my residence in a timely manner. Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: tjw

customer_reviews.title: Convenient warmth
customer_reviews.text: My wife is developing arthritis in her hands. She had been heating rice hulls in bags for pain reducing-warmth. That's not a practical solution everywhere. She really likes how she can use this discreetly wherever she goes. The flashlight and USB power port are thoughtful additions.
customer_reviews.author: George W. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Never without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! I always have cold hands (Raynauds) and was tired of the disposables. What I really love is that its 3 things I need in one small and cute package. Especially on over night flights I need my hands warm, my phone charged and I have to find stuff in my carry on. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: maureen smith

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product. Bought 2 as a gift for my husband and he loves them. They heat up super quick and last for hours. He normally just keeps them in his pockets when he is out in the cold, and slips his hands in to warm them up. The flashlight and power bank are nice features. You can truly feel the quality of this product. Totally recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must for a hunter!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my muff for deer hunting and it’s great! Definitely a game changer in hand warming industry.. i had a zippo before this and threw it out after I bought this. Puts out a lot of heat, and last a long time.. very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Jesse VanDusen

customer_reviews.title: nice, but a couple drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: hold a lot of charge and will warm for many hours. i wish it were thinner and i also wish the usb plugs weren't on the side. it makes them poke out and not good for keeping in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: c c

customer_reviews.title: No smell, turns on and off with a switch
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of the Zippo that you have light, and relight, and wasting lots of fuel on days that warm up sooner, this battery powered unit you just turn off when your done. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: Good heat, bad as a charger
customer_reviews.text: The heat was great, maybe too hot even on lowest setting but did keep me warm. The charging side didn't do well at all. Kept my phone plugged in all night and still was at 19%
customer_reviews.author: karen p. moreno

customer_reviews.title: Nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: I have perpetually cold hands, especially in the winter, so I was happy when I got this. The aluminum body gets nice and hot which is much better than the plastic that some other hand warmer are made out of. Fits snuggly in my pocket too. The added flashlight is bright as @$ which is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: wait.what

customer_reviews.title: Makes good heat
customer_reviews.text: Makes good amount of heat, but don't know how long the batteries will last yet seems good. Rather have a three position switch than pushing a button multiple times for different settings.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Renzoni

product_meta.title: The Outdoors Way Electric Hand Warmer, Rechargeable Accessory for Hunting and Winter Sports. Handwarmer Includes Phone Charger + LED Flashlight + Carry Pouch+ 2 Colors Options.
feature_bullets: DON’T MISS OUT ON YOUR NEXT OUTDOOR ADVENTURE! Ideal for anyone who hunts, fishes, hikes, camps or skis! This is the perfect solution that will keep the adventure going in any weather! POWERFUL 7200mAh lithium-ion battery provides SCENT-FREE warmth – NO FUEL required!

ENJOY COZY WARMTH FOR YOUR FINGERS AND HANDS! If you have Raynauds or any circulation problem, you will LOVE the double sided heat.Choose the optimum heat setting for your comfort: Warm (105 degrees) or high heat (115 degrees).
TRAVEL WITH CONFIDENCE! Keep your devices charged including phones, cameras, ipads, and other tablets.
STAY SAFE AT NIGHT with 55 lm flashlight with SOS setting. This flashlight can help light up dark spaces or signal for an emergency with an SOS strobe.

ADDED VALUE! Great Packaging, Bonus Carry Pouch and 100% Satisfaction Guarantee! The Outdoors Way is a small family owned business located in Colorado and we are happy to provide you with the best service and attention possible!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
